name: All For One (itch) (Mazz's Games)
description: AFO is a top down shooter where you play as a spaceship that has enemies out to kill them, your mission is to get as many of those alien rascals destroyed before they destroy you, you have crates to collect which are there to help you replenish some ammo and health points, after killing 5 enemies you gain a teammate that is there to help you defeat the enemies. Good luck hunting, we hope that you enjoy it!!
